/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about handling insufficient examination reports, including
insufficient examination reports
handling insufficient examination reports that were erroneously requested
clarification of examination reports
resolving inconsistencies
returning examination reports requested through the
Compensation and Pension Record Interchange (CAPRI)
, and
Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS)
determining whether a rework request or new examination scheduling request (ESR) in VBMS is required
handling non-Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) hospital reports that are insufficient for rating purposes
, and
requesting clarification from private physicians
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Insufficient Examinations
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
